description: A range of microscopic techniques including brightfield, darkfield, interference, fluorescence, and
advanced techniques including laser confocal microscopy are covered in this course.  In parallel
to microscope training sessions, students learn the latest computer techniques for video image
grabbing and analysis.  Teams design investigative projects that make use of appropriate mircoscope
and computer technologies.  Prerequisite: Biology 125, or Chemistry/Biology 125-127.  Offered during
